description.ruby-sapphire:
Fixes the foe with a mean
look that prevents escape.
description.emerald:
Fixes the foe with a mean
look that prevents escape.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The foe is fixed
with a mean look
that prevents it
from escaping.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user affixes the
foe with a dark,
arresting look.
The target becomes
unable to flee.
description.platinum:
The user affixes the
foe with a dark,
arresting look.
The target becomes
unable to flee.
description.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user affixes the
foe with a dark,
arresting look.
The target becomes
unable to flee.

arresting look.
The target becomes unable to flee.

effect.full:
The target cannot switch out normally.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.  This effect ends when the user leaves the field.

The target may still escape by using baton pass, u turn, or a shed shell.

Both the user and the target pass on this effect with baton pass.
effect.shortEffect: Prevents the target from leaving battle.
